revision.text:
DeCorEd is a [[DECORATE]] lump editor created by Samuel "insertwackynamehere" Horwitz which is still currently in its beta stages.
Its current version is Beta v.01 and it can be downloaded [http://www.wackyhq.com/global/downloads/wackyware/decored_beta_001.zip here]. A currently unfinished website is located [http://www.wackyhq.com/wackyware/decored/ here], and the official forums are [http://www.wackyhq.com/forums/index.php?showforum=20 here]. The official thread on the ZDoom forums is {{forum|here|p=59495}}.
[[Category:Dead software]]
